name: Nihilist Train
description:
I'm afraid my game won't work on web ... That must be the particles x) 
Please download the game on Windows or Mac, it does work !

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls are WASD or arrows 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Unfortunately, this world is filled with friends everywhere.
Try to avoid making too many, and keep riding the sadness rails !
